posts.title: Blueprint Alter Steps
posts.content: I should put some images and captions here

posts.title: How to Sixty-Nine a Sexy Pirate Mage*
posts.content:
1. Cast Doubling Season
  2. Cast Jace, Cunning Castaway
  3. Activate Jace's Ultimate, getting four copies of everyone's favorite sexy pirate mage. Repeat seventeen times
  4. Bask in Jace's sexy, sexy pirate glory
Players
Warren, Myself
Games Played
2
Decks
  • Game 1: Gishath Dino Ramp (Warren) vs (W)Malestrom Wanderer Walkers (Myself)
  • Game 2: Same

* My wife and I refer to this Jace as "Sexy Jace, the Pirate Mage"

posts.title: Dinos, Lazev and Mistakes Made
posts.content:
Players
Tom, Myself
Games Played
1
Decks
  • Game 1: (W)Gishath Dino Ramp (Myself) vs Lazav, Dimir Mastermind (Tom)

My early mistake: forgetting Lazav has hexproof. Tom's fatal mistake: forgetting your opponent can recast permanents bounced with Cyclonic Rift. 50 points for Ravenclaw!
